listings.title: Magnificent Oceanfront Estate
listings.description: Luxurious oceanfront property with breathtaking views, custom designed interiors, and smart home technology.

listings.title: Cozy Cottage with Monterey Bay Views
listings.description: Charming cottage with stunning views of Monterey Bay, updated kitchen, and spacious deck for outdoor entertaining.

listings.title: Contemporary Urban Loft in Pacific Grove
listings.description: Sleek and modern loft style home with high ceilings, open layout, and rooftop patio with city views.

listings.title: Secluded Retreat with Private Beach Access
listings.description: Peaceful retreat with direct access to a private beach, gourmet kitchen, large deck for al fresco dining, and hot tub.

listings.title: Golf Lover's Paradise in Pebble Beach
listings.description: Elegant estate overlooking renowned golf course, high-end finishes, spacious living areas, and infinity pool.

listings.title: Historic Victorian Home in Seaside
listings.description: Beautifully restored Victorian home with period details, wrap-around porch, and garden oasis perfect for relaxation.

listings.title: Modern Beachfront Villa in Monterey
listings.description: Sleek and stylish villa with direct beach access, private courtyard, gourmet kitchen, and panoramic ocean views.

listings.title: Elegant Mediterranean Mansion in Pebble Beach
listings.description: Grand Mediterranean estate with sweeping ocean views, neo-classical architecture, pool, spa, and guest house.

listings.title: Quaint Bungalow in Pacific Grove
listings.description: Adorable bungalow with updated kitchen, hardwood floors, cozy fireplace, and private backyard garden.

listings.title: Seaside Retreat with Panoramic Views
listings.description: Tranquil retreat with stunning views, expansive wrap-around deck, gourmet kitchen, and luxurious master suite.
